name: com.vklubkov.easyresolutions
description:
Automatically selects the appropriate scene based on screen resolution.

Particularly well-suited for games that aim to support a wide range of devices with varying scene resolutions, aspect ratios, and memory capacities by offering different UI/2D graphics layouts.

samples.description: A basic example demonstrating how to set up and use Easy Resolutions for the first time.
An in-depth showcase of Easy Resolutions' key features, including scene management, resource handling, and dynamic string selection.
Demonstrates how to integrate Easy Resolutions with Zenject (Extenject). Requires Extenject to be installed: https://github.com/Mathijs-Bakker/Extenject
